subject: What happened to getName()?
msgSnippet: Hi, I was wondering, is there a particularly good reason why the most useful method getName() was removed in junit 4.x? Is there another method or way for me
messageBody:
Hi,
I was wondering, is there a particularly good reason why the most useful method getName() was removed in junit 4.x? Is there another method or way for me to get the current name of the method executing for reporting purposes?

Thanks,

chaz
